tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Last week our baby was healed of what the doctors called an incurable disease (PPH). We had suffered for one month & at that time the pain seemed unbearable & did not know where I was going or what was before me. 
At that time,we were in a very depressed mental state, but Sasidhar sir gave us alot of confidence & made us feel at ease abt our baby's health..Really ur devotion & care brings healing,comfort & hope to us sir..Thanks for always listening and for the excellent care you provide with Sophisticated Medical Equipments,sir.We have been so blessed to have you in charge of (our son’s) Pulmonary needs.
Really ur words inspire us hope & made me a better mom and caregiver. 
Simply ur a TRULY AMAZING DOCTOR IS HARD TO FIND & IMPOSSIBLE TO FORGET..

Thank u sir for everything u have done to keep us in the pink of health & best of spirits!

we express our gratitude to u for always being there for us & for treating our problems..

Thanks a million for tirelessly working for our kid sir.GOD BLESS U,SIR!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We visited Dr. Shashidhar Vishwanath for our children's scheduled vaccination and the 6-year-old's continuous cough problem, which existed for more than 10 days.

The doctor explained the cause very clearly for any common man to understand. He takes away all your tension and worries about your child. You feel relaxed after the visit.  Most importantly, he does not recommend unnecessary medication. 

He is an excellent doctor with great human values, approachable with a smiling face. He listens to you very patiently and takes the utmost care of your child. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dear Doctor,

I wanted to express my heartfelt appreciation for your exceptional service in administering pediatric vaccinations to my child. Your expertise, patience, and genuine care have made the process not only smooth but reassuring for me as a parent.

Your commitment to ensuring the well-being of children is truly commendable, and I'm grateful for the peace of mind your care brings. Thank you for your dedication to the health of our little ones, and for being an outstanding pediatrician.

With sincere gratitude,
Prabhat
reply_text: Thanks very much for kind words .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: After a 9 month long wait, we had finally received what we had been waiting for- a cute face and a tiny pair of hands and legs. The entire family had burst into euphoria but crisis hit the day next when this reason of celebration had an episode of seizure and had to be admitted to NICU of Cloudnine.And it is during these periods when you understand how great a doctor can be.Dr. Sashidhar had been calm and composed doctor and had handled not just the baby but even our emotions. Faith did pay back eventually and now our baby is completely fine.Extremely grateful to him for all that he has done for us.
reply_text: Happy to see that your little one is doing so well

tags: None
review: I have been consulting Dr Shashidhar Vishwanath since my baby was 3 weeks old. My son is 2 now, healthy and happy. Dr Shashi is a very good dr. Very patient, always available for consultation and gives sufficient time to hear our problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shashidhar has been with us throughout the entire phase of our little ones journey - from being there at 3am for an emergency C-section and post that as well : those little hiccups, those grunting noises, the sneezes and coughs, follow ups and timely vaccination. He's always been prompt and friendly everytime we've reached out to him - be it on messages or calls. He's always been thorough and practical in his approach and helped us nurse our pre-term baby to good health. He is experienced *** ************* *** has always been there for us in our time of need - thank you Doctor, immensely!
reply_text: Thanks for your kind words . Much appreciated..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
A good medical care provider for your child is a blessing for your child's health and your mental health.
Dr Shashi encourages to ask question and concerns about your child's health. He is not a proponent of baby care products and never prescribe lots of medicines. 

He never ridicules or brush aside traditional practices and suggests and explains safety measures.

Being a new parent during a pandemic is overwhelming, Dr Shashi not only made sure to guide us about safety of our child but also ensured to provide safest environment for consultations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** ********** ** *** ** *** **** ************ *******He combines expertise and a willingness to listen and discuss.My sister in law had premature delivery in 30 weeks.
Of course We were under loss of stress ,we met Dr Shashidhar and because of his empathetic nature we immediately felt at ease – and felt confident that kid is in right hand.
He regularly gave us update about kid and his whole team managed to did awesome work and currently baby is healthy and smiling at his home.Thanks so much Doctor ,Nurses and Sparsh Hospital.
reply_text: Thanks very much for your feedback.  Very satisfying that baby born at 30 weeks has had no complications and so glad that he is developing well ..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Wonderful experience with Sparsh Hospital Dr. Shashidhar Vishwanath was a wonderful Neonatologist, Pediatrician, and the staff was always helpful and kind. He has terrific knowledge in his field. We went to hospital for premature birth at 34 weeks with complications, we were little panic situation for us as it was my first experience with this kind but after knowing the well adept doctors like him was really helpful. My baby was in NICU for a month. For this entire duration, under his guidance his team were really supported very well and we are very happy with his treatment, guidance, moral support. Now, he is my go to docker for any problems related to Neonatologist, Pediatrician. HIGHLY recommend. 

I would like to take this opportunity to express my gratitude to all my doctors below who are involved in my child treatment. 
Dr. Shashidhar Vishwanath
Dr. Shweta Gupta
Dr. Adinarayana Makam
reply_text: Thank you very much for your wonderful words. So glad we could make a difference ..

tags: None
review: Dr. Shashidhar is a very experienced pediatrician who understands the infants really well. He goes into the depth of the problem faced by infants to provide the best possible treatment. All the times I have visited him, he has provided appropriate prescription and treatment. He is very humble and explains stuff with his real-life examples making the patient understand what he is doing and why he is prescribing something. He ensured that he took utmost care while giving vaccinations to the babies. I strongly recommend Dr. Shashidhar for any infant/baby related medical consultation/vaccination and other treatments.

review: The doctor is extremely patient and hears us out. He’s not in a hurry to prescribe and send us off. He is very friendly and communicative. We as parents , feel very comfortable to take our baby to him. I would recommend him without a single second of hesitation.

tags: None
review: I have been consulting Dr. Shashidhar for my newborn baby girl. She was born about 3 weeks back and Since its my first baby, I had no idea about anything to do with a newborn. But Dr. was there throughout to help us out with everything, from how to take care of a newborn, to treating her for some medical issues. He was extremely meticulous with her treatment. Most importantly, he strongly stressed upon treating her by natural means rather than giving her medications and unnecessary medical interventions. He explained every step along the way and this to me was what established the trust completely. I generally tend to stress a lot over small things but he was very patient with my stress levels and never ending questions. He is really friendly, cooperative and approachable. During these tough times with respect to covid-19, we were highly apprehensive about Stepping out of the house with the baby. But Dr. Shashidhar was kind enough to help us out over the phone for most part. I would be more than happy to refer anyone I know to Dr. Shashidhar. Thank you so much Doctor for all the help.
reply_text: Thanks very much for your kind words.. I do my best to help but equally important is the cooperation of parents.. you have been very compliant with my advice and that helps..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: This was our first appointment with Dr.Shashidhar  for our daughter s vaccination doctor he made sure he went through the previous records and also explained very precise about the intent of the current vaccination and made sure our daughter felt comfortable  and she didn't even feel the prick ☺️, Thank you !

review:
Doctor is very easy to interact with, he listened to what we said, he asked questions that made sense, no additional talks beyond what was required. 
His understanding of the problem with my daughter and medication provided were really helpful, my daughter’s long standing cough issue has been properly treated and she is back to normal now. 
Thanks to doctor for guiding us and providing right medication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,

He listens patiently and guides parents properly and treats the kid well, whenever we wanted help outside hospital also thru WhatsApp he responds.
So far so good with him as well as hospital (cloud nine well maintained).

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr.Shashidhar is  extremely affable,  makes kids feel comfortable, listens thoroughly while trying to understand the problem and then communicates the treatment to kids in such a way they agree to follow the instructions (eg: not biting pencils, clothes..).
Most importantly keeps the medication as mild as possible.
